summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where the player character, armed with a staff, is engaging in combat with a grotesque enemy on a wooden bridge. The enemy appears to be a humanoid creature with distorted features. The environment is rugged and rocky, suggesting a wilderness or mountainous setting. The user interface displays various elements: in the bottom left corner, there are icons likely representing abilities or items; in the bottom center, a health bar and other status indicators are visible; and in the bottom right, additional icons with button prompts are shown, indicating possible actions or skills. On the right side of the screen, text shows "Will" with a value of 58 and a "+5" modifier, possibly indicating a resource or currency gained. The top right corner displays a numerical value of 31 with a "+40" modifier, which might relate to experience points or another gameplay metric.
